message.content:
We need to look through the transactions and pick out those whose “type” is “Depreciation.” In the provided table there are exactly two such records:

• The first depreciation record (id “Depreciation20240101001”) has an “amount” of 
  45751.670000000006

• The second depreciation record (id “Depreciation20240201002”) has an “amount” of 
  45751.600000000006

Since the cash flow statement “adds back” noncash depreciation expenses, the “final depreciation item” for the period is the sum of the depreciation expenses. So we add:

  45751.67 + 45751.60 ≈ 91503.27

Thus, the final depreciation to be reflected is approximately 91503.27.

Below is the answer in the requested json format:

---------------------------------------------------
{"solution": {"Depreciation": "91503.27"}}
---------------------------------------------------
